014package org.jdbi.v3.core.mapper;
015
016import java.sql.ResultSet;
017import java.sql.SQLException;
018
019import org.jdbi.v3.core.statement.StatementContext;
020
021/**
022 * Adapts a {@link ColumnMapper} into a {@link RowMapper} by mapping a single column.
023 */
024public class SingleColumnMapper<T> implements RowMapper<T> {
025    private final RowMapper<T> delegate;
026
027    /**
028     * Constructs a row mapper which maps the first column.
029     * @param mapper the column mapper to delegate to for mapping.
030     */
031    public SingleColumnMapper(ColumnMapper<T> mapper) {
032        this(mapper, 1);
033    }
034
035    /**
036     * Constructs a row mapper which maps the given column number.
037     * @param mapper the column mapper to delegate to for mapping
038     * @param columnNumber the column number (1-based) to map
039     */
040    public SingleColumnMapper(ColumnMapper<T> mapper, int columnNumber) {
041        this.delegate = (r, ctx) -> mapper.map(r, columnNumber, ctx);
042    }
043
044    /**
045     * Constructs a row mapper which maps the column with the given label.
046     * @param mapper the column mapper to delegate to for mapping
047     * @param columnLabel the label of the column to map
048     */
049    public SingleColumnMapper(ColumnMapper<T> mapper, String columnLabel) {
050        this.delegate = (r, ctx) -> mapper.map(r, columnLabel, ctx);
051    }
052
053    @Override
054    public T map(ResultSet r, StatementContext ctx) throws SQLException {
055        return delegate.map(r, ctx);
056    }
057}
